name: 4Ever Venivel Whitening Face Wash
description: Enriched with venivel from richly grown soil of Sri Lanka, this unique skin friendly cleanser moisturises, nourishes, whitens and prevents the skin from drying while whitening & giving a brighter complexion. Venivel face wash riched in natural vitamins & minerals gives a soft, smooth & radiant skin when used daily. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
